definition: regardless of the law and of natural morality (idiom); maverick/undisciplined and out of control
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
day/sky/heaven
lit. like a monk holding an umbrella — no hair, no sky (idiom) (punning on 髮|发[fa4] vs 法[fa3])/fig. defying the law and the principles of heaven/lawless
pinyin: he2 shang5 da3 san3 , wu2 fa3 wu2 tian1

sentences.english: She was the mother of two peremptory little boys.
sentences.chinese: 她現在已是兩個無法無天的小男孩的母親。

sentences.english: Catching up with these outlaws is harder than expected however.
sentences.chinese: 要找到這些“無法無天”的人比想象要難。

sentences.english: Their films exude a tone oflawlessness and despair.
sentences.chinese: 他們的作品流露出一種無法無天和絕望的氣氛。

sentences.english: Right now it's a domain of lawlessness.
sentences.chinese: 現在這是個無法無天的領域。

sentences.english: Is lawlessness in the area of property companies can?
sentences.chinese: 難道在小區中物業公司就能無法無天嗎？

sentences.english: It is lawless right now in the Wild West.
sentences.chinese: 現在的西部簡直無法無天。

sentences.english: This is called a licentiousness not to be tolerated.
sentences.chinese: 這就叫無法無天，是不能忍受的。

definition: original identity fully revealed (idiom); fig. to unmask and expose the whole truth
open the net on one side (idiom); let the caged bird fly/to give one's opponent a way out/lenient treatment
inhuman

lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom)/fig. extremely worried and troubled
to wish for the whole world to be in chaos (idiom)

definition: to run amok (idiom); to commit outrages
imperious/peremptory
to defend sb (a relative, friend or oneself) despite knowing that that person is in the wrong
path/conduct/behavior
to fight openly and maneuver covertly (idiom)
to slander/to smear/to vilify
powerless to defend oneself (idiom); helpless
double standard

to watch with folded arms (idiom); to look on without lifting a finger
